events.message: I ordered a jacket last week but it doesn't fit me at all. I want to return it and get a refund.
The customer's request has been categorized as a refund due to return of a product that does not fit.
The case has been assigned to agent Sarah M. for further handling.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I understand you want to return your jacket and request a refund. I am here to assist you.
Could you please provide your order number and let me know if the jacket has any damage or issues?
Sure, my order number is 79845321. The jacket looks fine, just too small for me, so no physical damage.
Thank you for the details. You are eligible for a full refund if you return the jacket in original condition within 14 days. I will email you the return instructions.
Thanks for the clear instructions. I will send the jacket back tomorrow and wait for the refund.
Great! We will process your refund as soon as we receive the returned jacket. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
Just checking in to confirm that you were able to return the jacket and received your refund. Please reach out if there are any issues.
Since your refund has been processed successfully, we are closing this case. Thank you for contacting customer support.
